special://skin/extras/buttons/status-on.png special://skin/extras/buttons/status-on.png special://skin/extras/buttons/status-off.png special://skin/extras/buttons/status-off.png InstallAddon(plugin.video.tacones) Dialog.Close(5202) ActivateWindow(Videos,"plugin://plugin.video.tacones/?url=%24doregex%5Bindex%5D&mode=17&regexs=%7B%27index%27%3A%20%7B%27name%27%3A%20%27index%27%2C%20%27listrepeat%27%3A%20%27%5Cn%3Ctitle%3E%5BB%5D%5BCOLOR%20red%5D%E2%80%A2%5B/COLOR%5D%20%5BCOLOR%20white%5D%5Bindex.param1%5D%5B/COLOR%5D%5BCOLOR%20red%5D%20%28%5Bindex.param8%5D%20%7C%20%5Bindex.param9%5D%29%5B/COLOR%5D%5B/B%5D%3C/title%3E%5Cn%3Clink%3E%24doregex%5Bgestor%5D%3C/link%3E%5Cn%3Cyear%3E%5Bindex.param8%5D%3C/year%3E%5Cn%3Cgenre%3E%5Bindex.param9%5D%3C/genre%3E%5Cn%3Cinfo%3E%5Bindex.param11%5D%3C/info%3E%5Cn%3Cthumbnail%3E%5Bindex.param6%5D%3C/thumbnail%3E%5Cn%3Cfanart%3E%5Bindex.param7%5D%3C/fanart%3E%5Cn%27%2C%20%27expres%27%3A%20%27title.%28.%2A%29..title.%5C%5Cs%2A.microhd.%28%5B%5ENA%5D%2B%29..microhd.%5C%5Cs%2A.fullhd.%28.%2A%29..fullhd.%5C%5Cs%2A.tresd.%28.%2A%29..tresd.%5C%5Cs%2A.cuatrok.%28.%2A%29..cuatrok.%5C%5Cs%2A.thumbnail.%28.%2A%29..thumbnail.%5C%5Cs%2A.fanart.%28.%2A%29..fanart.%5C%5Cs%2A.date.%28.%2A%29..date.%5C%5Cs%2A.genre.%28.%2A%29..genre.%5C%5Cs%2A.extra.%28.%2A%29..extra.%5C%5Cs%2A.info.%28.%2A%29..info.%27%2C%20%27page%27%3A%20%27https%3A//gitlab.com/stiletto1/s/-/raw/main/c%27%2C%20%27cookiejar%27%3A%20%27%27%7D%2C%20%27gestor%27%3A%20%7B%27name%27%3A%20%27gestor%27%2C%20%27expres%27%3A%20%22%23%24pyFunction%5Cndef%20GetLSProData%28page_data%2CCookie_Jar%2Cm%29%3A%5Cn%20calidad%20%3D%20%27%5Bindex.param2%5D%27%2C%20%27%5Bindex.param3%5D%27%2C%20%27%5Bindex.param4%5D%27%2C%20%27%5Bindex.param5%5D%27%5Cn%20for%20x%20in%20calidad%3A%5Cn%20%20%20%20if%20x%20%21%3D%20%27NA%27%3A%5Cn%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20calidad%20%3D%3D%20x%5Cn%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20break%5Cn%20%20%20%20else%3A%5Cn%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20x%20%3D%20%27%27%5Cn%20return%20%27plugin%3A//plugin.video.elementum/play%3Furi%3Dmagnet%3A%3Fxt%3Durn%3Abtih%3A%5Bindex.param2%5D%27%5Cn%22%2C%20%27page%27%3A%20None%2C%20%27cookiejar%27%3A%20%27%27%7D%7D&iconimage=https%3A%2F%2Fi.imgur.com%2FgdMxN0J.png",return) System.HasAddon(plugin.video.tacones)
